(0) isn’t Really A Number In Codeing! So If You Do ::item 7329 0 it don’t have an amount to give you so it goes to the nearest number (1) so it shell give you the Received End! if you add the codeing so number (0) isn’t Recognized then it wont do anything! i have the code for it if you need it just let me know!

item.title: Need coder to help fix glitch
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Set the Shop value of the Item I.D. Or add them into your Array for restricted Items if you don’t want them to be spawned at all.

Read full topic
item.source: Need coder to help fix glitch

item.title: Need coder to help fix glitch
item.dc:creator: @ther3aper ther3aper
item.description:
@ther3aper wrote:

If someone does this ::item 14484 0 they will get a free dragon claw or if they do ::item 14484 111111 they will get a free dragon claw how do i fix.
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
if (c.inWild())
return;
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" “);
if (args.length == 3) {
int [] unspawnAbles = {995}
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
int req = c.getShops().getItemShopValue(newItemID) * newItemAmount;
for (int j = 0; j < unspawnAbles.length; j++) {
if (newItemID == unspawnAbles[j]){
c.sendMessage(”"+server.model.items.Item.getItemName(newItemID)+" is a restricted item.");
return;
}
}
if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,req)) {
c.sendMessage("<col=255>You need atleast “+req+” coins to spawn “+newItemAmount+“x “+server.model.items.Item.getItemName(newItemID)+”.”);
return;
}
if ((newItemID <= 24000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
c.sendMessage(”<col=1800>you can only spawn 10 at a time DONT GO ABOVE");
c.sendMessage("<col=1800>you can only spawn 10 at a time DONT GO ABOVE");
c.sendMessage("<col=1800>you can only spawn 10 at a time DONT GO ABOVE");
c.sendMessage("<col=1800>you can only spawn 10 at a time DONT GO ABOVE");
c.sendMessage("<col=1800>you can only spawn 10 at a time DONT GO ABOVE");
c.sendMessage("<col=1800>you can only spawn 10 at a time DONT GO ABOVE");
c.sendMessage("<col=1800>you can only spawn 10 at a time DONT GO ABOVE");
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), req);
c.sendMessage("<col=1800>You have succesfully purchased "+newItemAmount+“x “+server.model.items.Item.getItemName(newItemID)+” for “+req+”.”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}
	{

Read full topic
